mapper.insert: insert into course(userId, cTitle, cContent, cSummary) values(#{userId}, #{cTitle}, #{cContent}, #{cSummary})
mapper.select: select * from course c join user u on u.userId = c.userId where cTitle Like CONCAT('%',#{cTitle},'%')
select count(*) from course c join user u on u.userId=c.userId where cTitle Like CONCAT('%',#{cTitle},'%')
select * from course c left join module m on c.courseId = m.courseId left Join user u on c.userId = u.userId where u.userId = #{userId} group by c.courseId;
select * from course order by wdate desc
select * from course order by cTitle ASC
select * from course order by udate DESC
